text: Sandra Julieta Torres Casanova (born 5 October 1955) is a Guatemalan politician. She was First Lady of Guatemala from 2008 to 2011. She was an unsuccessful candidate for president in 2015, 2019 and 2023. Torres was married to √Ålvaro Colom from 2002 until they divorced in 2011. In September 2019, she was arrested at her home on charges of violating campaign finance rules. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Guatemalan politicians Category:First Ladies Category:Living people
title: Sandra Torres
